attributes.action: Reject a second referendum, uphold the original EU Referendum, invoke Article 50
attributes.additional_details:
The British public DO NOT want a second referendum.

Uphold the democratic wishes of the British Public and avoid further destabilisation of the financial markets.

Invoke Article 50 of the Treaty of the Functioning of the European Union and begin exit negotiations urgently to stabilise European economies.
attributes.background: The referendum received one of the largest turnouts in history, and received a decisive majority of more than 1.2 million votes to exit the European Union. The British public DO NOT want a second referendum. Invoke Article 50 of the Treaty of the Functioning of the EU and begin exit negotiations now
